name: $requester
desc: A workflow participant that dispatches services (assigns another task to a participant).

name: $dispatcher
desc: A workflow participant that performs services.

name: $performer
desc: A workflow participant that monitors task activity.

name: $monitor
desc: A workflow participant that manages task activity.

name: $manager
desc: A workflow participant that acquires resources (specimens, images, etc) necessary to perform the task.

name: $acquirer
desc: A workflow participant that reviews task inputs or outputs.
